meta_title: What Is Provisioning? Definition & Industrial Importance
meta_description: Provisioning is the process of preparing IT and OT resources for operational use. Understand how automated provisioning streamlines industrial asset management.
title: Provisioning Definition
image_prompt: A high-tech industrial control room where a diverse group of maintenance engineers in professional PPE are using tablets to sync new IIoT sensors to a large, glowing digital twin display of a manufacturing line. The setting is clean, modern, and emphasizes the convergence of digital software and physical machinery. Photo-realistic, cinematic lighting, no text.
